metadata.description: The kickoff to the All-New Avengers line begins here, with new stories of the All-New, All-Different Avengers, Squadron Supreme, A-Force, New Avengers, Ultimates and Uncanny Avengers! Someone is carefully studying the movements of the Avengers and those in their orbit- but do they mean to harm, or help? Find out the first clues in this special launch issue!
metadata.name: Avengers
